name: WavyFX
description:
▪️ WavyFX uses 8 values to define how the animation looks.

▪️ Click or touch to regenerate the animation with random variable values.

▪️ Hover on the top left to access the sidebar, there you will find all the values for each variable which can be changed and a button to regenerate with the current fields values.

▪️ Everytime the animation is regenerated the values will get stored locally so when you load the page again it will load the stored variable values.

▪️ You can share the variable values with other people and they can get their animation to look exactly like yours.
